action: Check the request body/params against the API schema. Do not retry.

description: OAuth token is missing from the request.
action: Ensure the Authorization: Bearer {token} header is present.
Refresh the access token using the refresh_token and retry the request once.

description: The application does not have the required OAuth scope for this operation.
action: Add the missing scope to the OAuth authorization request and re-authorize the seller.

description: Inventory item not found for the specified SKU.
action: Verify the SKU. Create the inventory item before creating an offer.

description: An offer already exists for this SKU in this marketplace.
action: Use updateOffer instead of createOffer. Retrieve the existing offerId first.

description: The offer cannot be published due to listing validation errors (missing required aspects, prohibited content, etc.).
action: Review the errors[] array in the response body. Fix each validation issue. Check getItemAspectsForCategory for required fields.

description: Invalid order state for the requested operation.
action: Check the order's lineItems[].lineItemFulfillmentStatus before attempting to create a shipment.

description: API call limit reached for the day.
action: Back off and retry. Implement a daily quota tracker to avoid hitting this limit. Prefer bulk endpoints.
Retry with exponential backoff up to 5 times. If all fail, dead-letter and alert.

description: eBay API is temporarily unavailable (maintenance or overload).
action: Check eBay system status at developer.ebay.com/support. Retry with backoff.
